DOC.brief_summary: This trial is to assess the effectiveness of three types of acupuncture for patients with functional diarrhea comparing to a positive drug control.
DOC.brief_title: Acupuncture for Patients With Diarrhea-predominant IBS or Functional Diarrhea: a Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Outcome measurements: The frequency of bowel movement; The bristol stool scale; SF-36 evaluation
DOC.criteria: 1. Diagnosed as diarrhoeapredominant irritable bowel syndrome according to Rome III criteria; 2. Age between 18 and 65 years old; 3. Did not take any medicine for bowel symptoms and attend other clinical research; 4. Have inform consent signed. 1. Diarrhea caused by diseases such as infection, etc. 2. Patients can't express himself clearly or with mental diseases; 3. Tumor and other infectious diseases; 4. With other serious diseases of Cardiovascular, liver, kidney, digestive or blood system; Pregnant women or planned to be pregnant.
